summary: A Frenchwoman tells her marital troubles to a man she mistakes for a psychiatrist, and soon they form an unusual relationship.
cast: Sandrine Bonnaire|Fabrice Luchini|Michel Duchaussoy|Anne Brochet|Gilbert Melki|Laurent Gamelon|Hélène Surgère|Urbain Cancelier|Isabelle Petit-Jacques|Véronique Kapoyan|Benoît Pétré|Albert Simono|Claude Derepp|Aurore Auteuil|Ludovic Berthillot|Sabrina Brezzo
title: Confidencias muy íntimas
